page.title: 10GAMES WE PLAY IN 1985 PART 2
page.content: {Stuck in the Mud.} One person is 'it' and the rest run around. If the person who is 'it' tigs or touches one of the people who are running around they have to stand with their legs open and arms out. If a free person goes through that person's legs then they can run around again with everyone else. The game ends when everyone is standing with their legs open and arms out. {Dustbin} Dusbin is a game for a lot of people and one person is'it'.The person who is'it' has a tennis ball and all the other people run around.When they run around the person who is'it'says stop and he or she has to try and hit them with the ball.If the person hits them they are'it' but if they miss, everyone runs round again.
